mapper.insert: insert into worker(workerNum, name, age, sex, phoneNum, workTime, office, salary) values (#{workerNum}, #{name}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{phoneNum}, #{workTime}, #{office}, #{salary})
mapper.update: update worker set name = #{name}, age = #{age}, sex = #{sex}, phoneNum = #{phoneNum}, workTime = #{workTime}, office = #{office}, salary = #{salary} where workerNum = #{workerNum}
